SEARCH
Package hms.inventory

Class Medication

java.lang.Object
hms.inventory.Medication
public class Medication extends Object
Represents a medication including its name, current stock, stock alert level, and replenishment details. This class provides methods for managing stock levels and checking stock against alert thresholds.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medication

      public Medication(String medicationName, int initialStock, int stockAlert, int replenishAmount)
      Constructs a new Medication instance with specified details.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      initialStock - Initial stock level of the medication.
      stockAlert - The stock level at which an alert is raised.
      replenishAmount - The amount by which stock is replenished.

    • Medication

      public Medication()
      Default constructor for creating a Medication instance without preset values.

  • Method Details

    • setStockAlert

      public void setStockAlert(int newStockAlert)
      Sets the stock alert level for the medication.
      Parameters:
      newStockAlert - The new alert level at which a replenishment alert will be triggered.

    • consumeStock

      public void consumeStock(int amount)
      Consumes a specified amount of this medication's stock.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of medication to consume.

    • replenishStock

      public void replenishStock(int amount)
      Replenishes the stock of this medication by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount by which to increase the stock.

    • isBelowAlertLevel

      public boolean isBelowAlertLevel()
      Checks if the current stock is below the alert level.
      Returns:
      true if the current stock is less than the alert level, false otherwise.
